channel.title: Toml on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Toml on Arrans github.io

item.title: knadh/koanf
item.description: Simple, extremely lightweight, extensible, configuration management library for Go. Supports JSON, TOML, YAML, env, command line, file, S3 etc. Alternative to viper.

item.title: mikefarah/yq
item.description: yq is a portable command-line YAML, JSON, XML, CSV, TOML, HCL and properties processor

item.title: TomWright/dasel
item.description: Select, put and delete data from JSON, TOML, YAML, XML, INI, HCL and CSV files with a single tool. Also available as a go mod.

item.title: Boeing/config-file-validator
item.description: Cross Platform tool to validate configuration files
